title: Bug 18028: Rename package doesn't check if all resources are writable
description: When attempting to rename a package, the current implementation does not verify whether all resources within the package are writable.
OB: While trying to rename a package, the process completes without checking the writability of resources, leading to potential issues with read-only files.
EB: The precondition check during package renaming should include verification for writeability of all resources, ensuring that read-only files are not overlooked.
SR:
1. Open the IDE and create a project with a package containing read-only files.
2. Attempt to rename the package.
3. Observe that the process completes without checking the writeability status of resources.
